text: Suzzanne Douglas (April 12, 1957 â€“ July 6, 2021) was an American actress. She was best known for her role as Geraldine "Jerri" Peterson on The WB sitcom The Parent 'Hood. She also played Cissy Houston in the Lifetime TV movie Whitney (2015). Douglas died on July 6, 2021, at age 64, at her home in Martha's Vineyard from pancreatic cancer. ==References== ==Other websites== * * Category:1957 births Category:2021 deaths Category:American movie actors Category:American television actors Category:American stage actors Category:American voice actors Category:Actors from Chicago Category:Deaths from pancreatic cancer
